justification: Vendor 3 provides explicit evidence of prescriptive guidance capabilities: 'Cloud 3 enables Digital Twins to go beyond diagnostics by delivering prescriptive guidance using embedded AI, operational rules, and contextual awareness.' The ability section further elaborates on creating recommendations based on analytics, rules, and workflow. Supported interfaces and compliance (REST APIs, Python SDKs, GDPR, ISO/IEC 27001, NIST SP 800-53) are also clearly listed, fully and clearly supporting the requirement.
